The history saving thread hit an unexpected error (DatabaseError('database disk image is malformed')).History will not be written to the database.

show_doc[source]

show_doc(elt, doc_string:bool=True, name:str=None, title_level:int=None, disp:bool=True, default_cls_level:int=2)

Show documentation for element elt with potential verbose inputs. Supported types: class, function, and enum.

Parameters:

  • elt : <class 'inspect._empty'> 
     Some function or class to pull up the documentation for
  • doc_string : <class 'bool'>, optional 
     Whether to display the doc string
  • name : <class 'str'>, optional 
     An optional name to use instead
  • title_level : <class 'int'>, optional 
     The heading level
  • disp : <class 'bool'>, optional 
     Whether to display the Markdown
  • default_cls_level : <class 'int'>, optional 
     If elt is a class, a heading level to use for it

Returns:

  • <class 'str'> 
     The documentation as a string
{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

doc[source]

doc(elt)

Show show_doc info in preview window when used in a notebook

Parameters:

  • elt : <class 'inspect._empty'> 
     Some function or class to pull up the documentation for
